description: &3Signs&r can be used to help &dlabel&r &3chests&r, &3rooms&r, &3machines&r, and more. Different kinds of &3Wood&r change the background, and the &dtext color can be dyed&r!
&eItem frames&r can also be used to help &dorganize&r - a &3single item&r can be placed in them for display.
For longer notes, craft a &3Book and Quill&r to write and store passages. &3Signing&r a book prevents it from being edited further.
&7[Inventory Tabs]&r Placing an item frame on a &3Chest&r will &dchange its tab icon&r.
